articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.title: European Union regulators accuse Apple of breaching the bloc's tech rules - CNBC
articles.description: Apple's App Store practices have been in the crosshairs of European Union regulators this year.
articles.content:
European Union regulators on Monday said that Apple is in breach of sweeping new tech rules because it does not allow customers of its App Store to be steered to alternatives.
